entry.title: Safe And Sound
entry.summary:
Author: Boltbot

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,643Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 712

Summary: Bruce opened his eyes.A red cape rippled in the wind above him. A gold symbol—bold, and bright—stood out against the deep blue of a suit that barely seemed real.And then the face. Calm, focused, and unabashedly kind.Superman.“You alright?” the hero asked, voice deep and sure, like the world wasn’t ending around them.Bruce blinked, not sure what surprised him more—the fact that he was alive, or the man who’d made sure of it.“I-I am now,” he muttered, mind still scrambling after the fall.Superman’s smile was subtle, but real. “You know, I never get tired of hearing that.”And just like that, Bruce Wayne—who’d accepted death—was held in the arms of something he didn’t believe in.Hope. ⪻────𖤓────⪼ Billionaire Bruce Wayne reluctantly attends a charity gala in Metropolis to represent Wayne Enterprises and support the city’s post-crisis recovery. There, he unexpectedly bonds with a charming, awkward reporter who turns his life around in more ways than one…
